title: #71 - Don’t Poison Your Husband Even If You Know How to with Jennifer Wright
description:
This week’s episode combines two of Maria’s favorite things: love and true crime with author and her friend Jennifer Wright!

Jennifer Wright is the author of numerous pop history books, including “Get Well Soon: History's Worst Plagues” and the “Heroes That Fought Them.” Her new book, “She Kills Me: True Tales of History's Deadliest Women,” is now available. She's written for The New York Times, The New York Post, The New York Observer, The New Yorker.com and even some publications that are not based in New York.

Pick up a copy of She Kills Me at https://amzn.to/3mi41S0 

Follow Jen on Twitter at https://twitter.com/jenashleywright

Learn more about Jen at https://www.jenashleywright.com/

Follow Maria on Instagram at http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Ask a Matchmaker on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker

If you’d like to learn more about Agape Match’s services or enroll in an upcoming Agape Intensive, visit agapematch.com/services
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
